name: tm62
effect: Teaches Silver Wind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Acrobatics to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Silver Wind)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is attacked with powdery
scales blown by wind. It may also
raise all the user’s stats.

The foe is attacked with powdery
scales blown by wind. It may also
raise all the user’s stats.

scales blown by wind. It may also
raise all the user’s stats.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive damage.
